member.name: T:RedirectTool.Program
member.remarks: Generates an executable for our Redirect Builder Program

member.name: M:RedirectTool.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The entry point for the application.
member.param: A list of command line arguments

member.name: T:RedirectTool.RedirectBuilder
member.summary: This tool extracts 301 and 302 redirects from an .htaccess file and builds hard webpages instead
member.remarks: For use in converting a website from an Apache server to IIS

member.name: F:RedirectTool.RedirectBuilder.redirectsList
member.summary: List that will hold the initial values from .htaccess

member.name: M:RedirectTool.RedirectBuilder.ReadFile(System.String)
member.summary: ReadFile opens the .htaccess file and extracts 301 and 302 redirects.
member.param: Name of the .htaccess file to open
member.remarks: For use in converting a website from an Apache server to IIS
